subject: Margin Call Notice Cash Collateral Client A
content:
Margin Call Notice

Pursuant to the agreement between Client A and

CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS LTD

We hereby give notice of the following Collateral Movement as of Close of Business 11/12/2018.

 

 

Net Margin Details (all figures in EUR)

 

Exposure:                                          7,914,265         

Independent Amount(s)                                                

Initial Margin Amount(s)                                             

Threshold:                                         0                 

 

Credit Support amount                              -7,914,265          

Collateral Held/(Pledged) in cash:                 -1,000,000

Collateral Held/(Pledged) in Securities:                             

 

Return/Deliver Amount to Client A                                     8,914,265         

Minimum transfer amount:                           250,000

Rounding amount:                                   10,000

                                                                                                                                         

Total Market Value of Collateral required pursuant to this notice :  8,920,000                  

 

Please contact us to confirm your agreement to the amount of the collateral Movement and advise Settlement Details.

 

Client A Standard Settlement  Instructions

Currency: EUR

 

 

Kind Regards,

 

XXXXXX XXXXXX

XXXX-XXXXXX (XX) 

 

XXX, XXXX-XXXXXX (XX) 

	T    +123456789

		
Xxxxxxx 1234 

	M    

	 

	
1234 XX  Xxxxxxx

	E    xxx.xxxx@xxxxxxxx.xx <mailto:xxx.xxxx@xxxxxxxx.xx>
